resources.string: Numbers of XML string resources for Activities' names and corresponded descriptions are not match.

string-array.name: children_activity_description
string-array.item: Demonstrates CircleTouchableView widget which provides a View with oval touchable area. If the view is square, the touchable area is round. Touching outside the touchable area will be ignored bu the widget. state-list background with oval shapes as items is suitable for this widget.
